page.title: 14FARMING.
page.content: { Hill Farm Elsfield,}is owned and farmed by Mr Garson. Mr K. Bradford, the farm manager since{1968,}is responsible for{750}acres of farmland on which crops are grown, including barley and wheat. There is a five year crop rotation, with different fields rotated, sown and harvested. It is a modern farm, machinery-wise, with{7}tractors and{2}combine harvesters which cost over{38,000} pounds each. They have lots of farm animals including{cows, bulls,} {chickens,}etc. They also run a{'Pick Your Own'} system, with fields reserved for people who want to pick their own {fruit,}or{vegetables.} The farm, however, does not get much of its income this way but from selling the{various crops}grown.
